bio: Shivalik Sharma is an Indian cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Baroda in the 2018â€“19 Ranji Trophy on 6 December 2018. In the auction for Indian Premier League, 2024, he was picked by the Mumbai franchise. He acts as a lower order left-handed batter. In the 2023 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, he scored 114 runs in 10 matches.
